languages.text: "Взвесим тяжесть твоих прегрешений, {name}, и узнаем, чем ты успел{mf||а} запятнать себя в глазах Императора".
"Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."
languages.original_text: "Взвесим тяжесть твоих прегрешений, {name}, и узнаем, чем ты успел{mf||а} запятнать себя в глазах Императора".

traits.locale_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

traits.locale_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “咱们来讨论一下你犯下的罪过，{name}，了解一下你有哪些所作所为在帝皇眼中属于亵渎之举。”
languages.original_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: “咱们来讨论一下你犯下的罪过，{name}，了解一下你有哪些所作所为在帝皇眼中属于亵渎之举。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「お前の罪の重さを量ろう。{name}、皇帝の目をいかに汚したか、知るがよい」
languages.original_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の罪の重さを量ろう。{name}、皇帝の目をいかに汚したか、知るがよい」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Veamos cuál es el peso de la gravedad de sus infracciones, {name}, y cómo se ha mancillado a ojos del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: «Veamos cuál es el peso de la gravedad de sus infracciones, {name}, y cómo se ha mancillado a ojos del Emperador».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Wägen wir die Schwere Eurer Verbrechen ab, {name}, und erfahren, wie sehr Ihr Euch in den Augen des Imperators besudelt habt."
languages.original_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Wägen wir die Schwere Eurer Verbrechen ab, {name}, und erfahren, wie sehr Ihr Euch in den Augen des Imperators besudelt habt."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Évaluons donc la gravité de vos transgressions, {name}, afin de savoir à quel point vous vous êtes {mf|souillé|souillée} aux yeux de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: « Évaluons donc la gravité de vos transgressions, {name}, afin de savoir à quel point vous vous êtes {mf|souillé|souillée} aux yeux de l'Empereur. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Suçlarının ağırlığını tartıp kendini İmparator'un gözünde nasıl karaladığını öğrenelim {name}"
languages.original_text: "Let us weigh the gravity of your transgressions, {name}, and learn how you have sullied yourself in the Emperor's eyes."

traits.locale_text: "Suçlarının ağırlığını bir tartalım ve kendini İmparator'un gözünde nasıl karaladığını öğrenelim {name}"
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
